txt.en: Your efforts within Tham Mírdain have not gone unnoticed by the Elves of Rivendell. Because of your unceasing aid in the defence of Mirobel, they have bestown upon you the title of Protector.
You have hindered the efforts of the White Hand and the Iron Crown at Tham Mírdain, securing the knowledge lost there when Sauron razed the realm of Eregion.
